channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 02:38 Driven anxiety in the Nikolaev area. Stop after further reports.
item.description: 游릭 02:38 Driven anxiety in the Nikolaev area. Stop after further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 02:37 Dumping anxiety in the Kherson region.Creck on further messages.

item.title: 游리 01:35 Failure to the Kharkiv Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv District- Lauda Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 01:35 Failure to the Kharkiv Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv District- Lauda Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
